paper.title: Canonical labeling of graphs
paper.venue: Symposium on the Theory of Computing
paper.abstract: We announce an algebraic approach to the problem of assigning canonical forms to graphs. We compute canonical forms and the associated canonical labelings (or renumberings) in polynomial time for graphs of bounded valence, in moderately exponential, exp(n ½ + o(1) ),time for general graphs, in subexponential, n log n , time for tournaments and for 2-(n,k,λ) block designs with k,λ bounded and n log log n time for λ-planes (symmetric designs) with λ bounded. We prove some related problems NP-hard and indicate some open problems.
